author: Howard Boyle
description: Auto LED flashing strobe light with motion detector to be worn on garments for social distancing.
summary: Small postage stamp size ( Indicia ) flashing LED light , with a built in motion detector to be worn on outer garments hats/goggles/protective garments/etc. EXAMPLE:  I wear a LED pin that flashes when you get too close too me.  You wear a LED pin that flashes when I get too close to you. You don't have to be polite and ask me to get out of your face, and, I don't have to be polite and ask you to stay out of my face.
title: Social Distancing - Auto LED strobe Light/with motion detector .
